name: Biochemistry Senior Research
credits: 1 to 7; can be repeated with change in content up to 15 credits; Prereq: CHM 2210, CHM 2211, CHM 3215, CHM 3216 and CHM 3217 or the equivalent, BCH 4024 and interdisciplinary major status
description: Laboratory investigations of biochemical problems of current interest. Senior thesis required.
